
```{r render, eval=FALSE	}
here()
file <- "001_compress_files.Rmd"
file  <- basename(file)
dir="rmd"

jimTools::ren_pdf(file,dir)
jimTools::ren_github(file, dir)
```

```{r compress}
# all files in rmd/
tar(tarfile = 
		here("compressed/compressed_file.tar.gz"),
		files = here("rmd"),
		compression = c("gzip")
)

```
